00019 #define VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY            0x000000002
00020 #define VO_BLT_DESTTRANSPARENCY           0x000000120
00021 #define VO_BLT_SHADOW                     0x000000200
00022 #define VO_BLT_TRANSSHADOW                0x000000003
00023 #define VO_BLT_UNCOMPRESSED               0x000004000
00024 #define VO_BLT_CLIP                             0x000000001
00025 #define VO_BLT_MIRROR_Y                   0x000001000 // must be the same as VS_BLT_MIRROR_Y for Wiz!!!

00044 // Z-buffer info structure for properly assigning Z values
00045 typedef struct
00046 {
00047       INT8              bInitialZChange;        // difference in Z value between the leftmost and base strips
00048       UINT8             ubFirstZStripWidth;     // # of pixels in the leftmost strip
00049       UINT8             ubNumberOfZChanges;     // number of strips (after the first)
00050       INT8 *            pbZChange;              // change to the Z value in each strip (after the first)
00051 } ZStripInfo;
00052 
00053 typedef struct
00054 {
00055       UINT16 *          p16BPPData;
00056       UINT16                  usRegionIndex;
00057       UINT8             ubShadeLevel;
00058       UINT16                  usWidth;
00059       UINT16                  usHeight;
00060       INT16             sOffsetX;
00061       INT16             sOffsetY;
00062 } SixteenBPPObjectInfo;
00063 
00064 // This definition mimics what is found in WINDOWS.H ( for Direct Draw compatiblity )
00065 // From RGB to COLORVAL
00066 #define FROMRGB(r, g ,b)  ((UINT32) (((UINT8) (r) | ((UINT16) (g) << 8)) | (((UINT32) (UINT8) (b)) << 16)))

00069 // Video object creation flags
00070 // Used in the VOBJECT_DESC structure to describe creation flags
00071 
00072 #define VOBJECT_CREATE_DEFAULT                    0x00000020            // Creates and empty object of given width, height and BPP
00073 #define VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE                   0x00000040            // Creates a video object from a file ( using HIMAGE )
00074 #define VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMHIMAGE           0x00000080            // Creates a video object from a pre-loaded hImage
00075 
00076 // VOBJECT FLAGS
00077 #define     VOBJECT_FLAG_SHADETABLE_SHARED 0x00000100
00078 
00079 // This structure is a video object. 
00080 // The video object contains different data based on it's type, compressed or not
00081 typedef struct TAG_HVOBJECT
00082 {
00083       UINT32                                          fFlags;                                               // Special flags
00084       UINT32                                          uiSizePixData;                // ETRLE data size
00085       SGPPaletteEntry               *pPaletteEntry;                     // 8BPP Palette                                   
00086       COLORVAL                                  TransparentColor;             // Defaults to 0,0,0
00087       UINT16                                          *p16BPPPalette;                     // A 16BPP palette used for 8->16 blits
00088       
00089       PTR                                                         pPixData;                                 // ETRLE pixel data
00090       ETRLEObject                               *pETRLEObject;                      // Object offset data etc
00091       SixteenBPPObjectInfo    *p16BPPObject;
00092       UINT16                                                *pShades[HVOBJECT_SHADE_TABLES]; // Shading tables
00093       UINT16                                                *pShadeCurrent;
00094       UINT16                                                *pGlow;                                               // glow highlight table
00095       UINT8                                                 *pShade8;                                       // 8-bit shading index table
00096       UINT8                                                 *pGlow8;                                        // 8-bit glow table
00097       ZStripInfo                                **ppZStripInfo;                     // Z-value strip info arrays
00098 
00099       UINT16                                                usNumberOf16BPPObjects;
00100       UINT16                                                usNumberOfObjects;      // Total number of objects
00101       UINT8                                                 ubBitDepth;                               // BPP 
00102 
00103       // Reserved for added room and 32-byte boundaries
00104       BYTE                                                                          bReserved[ 1 ];
00105 
00106 
00107 } SGPVObject, *HVOBJECT;
00108 
00109 
00110 // This structure describes the creation parameters for a Video Object
00111 typedef struct
00112 {
00113       UINT32                        fCreateFlags;                                   // Specifies creation flags like from file or not
00114       union
00115       {
00116             struct
00117             {
00118                   SGPFILENAME       ImageFile;                                      // Filename of image data to use
00119             };
00120             struct
00121             {
00122                   HIMAGE                        hImage;
00123             };
00124       };
00125       UINT8                         ubBitDepth;                                     // BPP, ignored if given from file
00126 } VOBJECT_DESC;
